// easy , simple and neat code 

#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	//east for -1 and south for 1

	while(t--)
	{
		int n , m;

		cin >> n >> m;

		int a[n + 1][m + 1];
		// int visited[n][m];
		int c =0 ;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			for(int j = 0; j < m; j++)
			{
				cin >> a[i][j];
				// visited[i][j] = 0;
			}
		}
		// a[0][0] = -4;
		int i = 0, j =0;
		 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
a[i][m]=2147483647;
 
for(j=0;j<m;j++)
a[n][j]=2147483647;
i = j = 0;
while(a[i + 1][j] != 2147483647 || a[i][j + 1] != 2147483647)
{
				if(a[i][j + 1] < a[i + 1][j] )
				{
					c++;
					a[i][j] = a[i][j + 1];
					j = j + 1;
				}
				else if(a[i + 1][j] < a[i][j + 1])
				{
					a[i][j] = a[i+1][j];c++;
					i = i + 1;
				}
				else if(i + 1 >= n && j + 1 < m && a[i][j + 1] != 2147483647)
				{
					a[i][j] = a[i][j + 1];c++;
					j = j + 1;
				}
				else if(j + 1 >= m && i + 1 < n && a[i + 1][j] != 2147483647)
				{
					a[i][j] = a[i+1][j];c++;
					i = i + 1;
				}
				

			}

	
	// for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	// 	{
	// 		for(int j = 0; j < m; j++)
	// 		{if(visited[i][j] != 0)c++;
	// 		}}
			cout << c << endl;
}
	return 0;
}
